data.trans_hint: Tôi gần như ngủ  trong suốt bài thuyết trình.
data.en_hint: I amost drifted  off during the presentation.
data.content_game_1: I amost drifted off during the presentation.
data.answer_en_hint: I amost drifted off during the presentation.

data.trans: Thành công khi làm điều gì đó khó khăn, đặc biệt là qua kì thi
data.trans_hint: Anh ta có thể vượt qua kỳ thi nếu may mắn.
data.en_hint: He might scrape through the exam if he's lucky.
data.content_game_1: He might scrape through the exam if he's lucky.
data.answer_en_hint: He might scrape through the exam if he's lucky.

data.trans: (đối với máy móc) Dừng hoạt động vì bị kẹt
data.trans_hint: Động cơ của chiếc xe đột nhiên dừng hoạt động.
data.en_hint: The car's engine is suddenly seized up.
data.content_game_1: The car's engine is suddenly seized up.
data.answer_en_hint: The car's engine is suddenly seized up.

data.trans_hint: Tôi tình cờ phát hiện được một chiếc váy xinh xắn ở chợ trời.
data.en_hint: I stumbled across a nice dress at the flea market.
data.content_game_1: I stumbled across a nice dress at the flea market.
data.answer_en_hint: I stumbled across a nice dress at the flea market.

data.trans: Thề bằng danh dự của ai đó
data.trans_hint: Tôi thề bằng danh dự của mẹ tôi rằng tôi đang nói sự thật.
data.en_hint: I swear by the name of my mother that i'm telling the truth.
data.content_game_1: I swear by the name of my mother that i'm telling the truth.
data.answer_en_hint: I swear by the name of my mother that i'm telling the truth.

data.trans: Phớt lờ cái gì (có phần thô lỗ)
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã cố gắng làm quen với anh ta nhưng anh ta lại phớt lờ tôi.
data.en_hint: I tried to get to know him but he just brushed me off.
data.content_game_1: I tried to get to know him but he just brushed me off.
data.answer_en_hint: I tried to get to know him but he just brushed me off.

data.trans_hint: Khi tôi nghe tên của anh ấy, mọi kỷ niệm đột nhiên ùa về.
data.en_hint: When I heard his name, all of the memories flooded back.
data.content_game_1: When I heard his name, all of the memories flooded back.
data.answer_en_hint: When I heard his name, all of the memories flooded back.

data.trans_hint: Đừng hóng hớt nữa - Bạn nên để tâm đến chuyện của mình thôi.
data.en_hint: Stop nosing around - you should mind your own business.
data.content_game_1: Stop nosing around - you should mind your own business.
data.answer_en_hint: Stop nosing around - you should mind your own business.

data.trans: Quyết tâm làm gì đó (dù là khó khăn)
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã quyết tâm với công việc kinh doanh này trong nhiều năm nhưng không được nhiều tiến triển.
data.en_hint: He's plugged away at this business for years but hasn't made much progress.
data.content_game_1: He's plugged away at this business for years but hasn't made much progress.
data.answer_en_hint: He's plugged away at this business for years but hasn't made much progress.

data.trans: Đi theo ai đó (vì bạn không có gì để làm)
data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn ra ngoài hôm nay, tôi có thể đi cùng bạn không?
data.en_hint: If you go out today, can I string along with you?
data.content_game_1: If you go out today, can I string along with you?
data.answer_en_hint: If you go out today, can I string along with you?

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy hứa sẽ cho tôi vào công ty đó, nhưng tôi nghĩ cô ấy chỉ lừa dối tôi mà thôi.
data.en_hint: She promised to get me into that company, but I think she was just stringing me along.
data.content_game_1: She promised to get me into that company, but I think she was just stringing me along.
data.answer_en_hint: She promised to get me into that company, but I think she was just stringing me along.
